actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to prohibit medicaid payments for abortions except in cases of medical necessity.

summary.text: Prohibits under the Social Security Act, title XIX (grants to States for medical assistance programs) medical payments for abortions except in cases of medical necessity.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to prohibit medicaid payments for abortions except in cases of medical necessity.
